containing_words.word: 拉鲁湿地国家自然保护区

definition: Wolong giant panda nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: wo4 long2 da4 xiong2 mao1 bao3 hu4 qu1

definition: Wolong nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan, home of the giant panda 大熊貓|大熊猫
pinyin: Wo4 long2 zi4 ran2 bao3 hu4 qu1

sentences.english: And finally let's pass by the Waterbird Refuge.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们经过了水鸟保护区。

sentences.english: To learn about the Wolong Panda Reserve was really interesting.
sentences.chinese: 了解到卧龙熊猫保护区的情况真有意思。

sentences.english: Resources of medicinal plants in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫椤自然保护区药用植物资源。

sentences.english: Now visitors to the reserve will have a chance to witness the same.
sentences.chinese: 而今，到保护区的游客们同样有机会目睹这样的美景。

sentences.english: Yili area is one of the most abundant protected area in Xinjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁地区是新疆自然保护区数量最多的地区。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou Valley is a nature reserve located in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟是位于中国四川省的自然保护区。

sentences.english: There are 265 national-level nature conservation zones, according to the Ministry of Environmental Protection.
sentences.chinese: 据环境保护部，中国有265个国家级自然保护区。

sentences.english: In addition, the ministry will accelerate construction of an ecological reserve for Qiang ethnic culture.
sentences.chinese: 同时，政府部门将加快羌族文化生态保护区建设。

sentences.english: Visit the Mai Po Nature Conservation Area with your teachers or parents.
sentences.chinese: 和你的教师或父母一起参观米埔自然保护区。

sentences.english: The downstream reach of Tankeng Hydropower Station is a key protection area of Pelochely bibroni.
sentences.chinese: 滩坑水电站下游为国家一级保护水生动物鼋的保护区。

sentences.english: There are a number of sections of the refuge that are particularly good for birders and naturalists.
sentences.chinese: 保护区有许多区段特别吸引猎鸟者和自然爱好者。

sentences.english: A preliminary study of the seed plants in the Yezhong Francois Leaf Monkey Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 六盘水野钟黑叶猴自然保护区种子植物初步调查。

sentences.english: Orange sunset in Florida's Big Cypress National Preserve.
sentences.chinese: 橙色的日落在佛罗里达的大柏树国家的保护区。

sentences.english: Thus natural preservation for wild rice should be established.
sentences.chinese: 而促进栽培稻的发展，必须建立野生稻自然保护区。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the fern medicine resources of Ailaoshan Mountain national nature reserve.
sentences.chinese: 报道哀牢山国家级自然保护区药用蕨类植物资源。

sentences.english: Pteridophytes in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫椤自然保护区蕨类植物。

definition: population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
(bird species of China) black stork (Ciconia nigra)
(bird species of China) scaly-sided merganser (Mergus squamatus)
(bird species of China) black-necked crane (Grus nigricollis)
